about_the_game:
Remember when you were a kid, and the streets were your territory, where every curb, puddle, and sidewalk turned into an epic mission? Bambas! brings that magic back with a sandbox game that lets you relive those street adventures, thanks to a groundbreaking control system.

In the demo version of Bambas!, you’ll be able to explore a portion of the final game’s stage, including the park and the skate zone.
